page.title: 07Employment
page.content: Of the people that replied to our questionnaire 34% work locally in farming, 23% work from home either as artists or printers or woodcarvers, 23% are retired, 10% commute to Cheltenham, Gloucester or even London and 10% are unemployed. THere used to be many more people working on the farms but mechanisation has meant that a fairly large farm can now be run by just two people rather than the 15 to 20 that used to work the land. The largest employer is the Cotswold Farm Park, but most of their employees only work on a seasonable basis. Several people drive lorries and the local pub also employs several people on a part-time basis. The school employs 6 people.
